pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data Struct Reference

Data generated when a Pokémon is added to a trainer's party in Generation I. More...

#include <pksav/gen1/pokemon.h>

 The Pokémon's Special stat.
 

Detailed Description

Data generated when a Pokémon is added to a trainer's party in Generation I.

All of this information is generated from values stored in pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon_t.

Field Documentation

◆ level

uint8_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::level

The Pokémon's level.

This value is also stored in pksav_gen1_pc_pokemon_t.level.

◆ max_hp

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::max_hp

The Pokémon's maximum HP.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base HP stat, HP EV, and HP IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ atk

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::atk

The Pokémon's Attack stat.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Attack stat, Attack EV, and Attack IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ def

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::def

The Pokémon's Defense stat.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Defense stat, Defense EV, and Defense IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ spd

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::spd

The Pokémon's Speed stat.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Speed stat, Speed EV, and Speed IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ spcl

uint16_t pksav_gen1_pokemon_party_data::spcl

The Pokémon's Special stat.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Special stat, Special EV, and Special IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.
